class.name: KeysClause
class.brief_description: A clause for filtering by keys.
class.description: The KeysClause class allows filtering entities or events based on their keys and models.

method.name: add_key
method.description: Adds a key to the clause.

method.name: add_model
method.description: Adds a model to the clause.

method.name: keys
method.description: Sets the keys for the clause. [codeblock] var clause = KeysClause.new() clause.keys(["0x123...", "0x456..."]) [/codeblock]

method.name: models
method.description: Sets the models for the clause. [codeblock] var clause = KeysClause.new() clause.models(["dojo_starter-Moves"]) [/codeblock]

method.name: remove_key
method.description: Removes a key from the clause.

method.name: remove_model
method.description: Removes a model from the clause.

method.name: to_dict
method.description: Converts the clause to a dictionary representation.

constants.constant: Matches keys with a fixed length.
Matches keys with a variable length.
